Enjoy our latest update to provide you with a seamless experience. Thanks for joining us on our incredible journey!

- New additions to Group chat: Mention others by typing name (or using @) and increase the member limit to 500 people
- Reply suggestion with sticker/GIF

Thanks for joining us on our incredible journey!

- iPhone X support
- Add reactions to Group and regular Conversations
- Message Backup via iTunes or iCloud

- iPhone X support
- Add reactions to Group and regular Conversations
- Message Backup via iTunes or iCloud

- New features for Group conversations, helping you better communicate and store photos from friends, family and colleagues
- Bug fixes and improvements for better Video call experience

- New Alias feature enables you to find your friends easily
- Restore messages from old iPhone

Thanks for joining us on our incredible journey!

- Copy and paste photos directly in conversations

Beside Zalo mobile, you can also experience Zalo on your laptop with Zalo PC. Try it now at zalo.me/may-tinh

- Update ‘the year of Pig’ theme in the app
- Features to support giving new year wishes

- Update message UI of link, file, photos
- Add option to send personal card with his/her phone numbers

- The new video call screen helps you view and answer the call more easily than before
- Know the call information (duration, missed call,…) more clearly with call bubble right in the chat space
- New feature: Phone conversion tool to easily convert 11 digit to 10 digit phone numbers in your phonebook

- Share your real time location in chat box with Live Location
- Background Feed allows you to post status in a more vivid way
- Update location checkin

- Support sharing photos, videos, and files from Photos Library and other apps to Zalo
- Accept friend request quickly in conversations
- Type @All to mention all other group members
- Improve photo viewing experience and album organization in Sh
